'''2.2.7206''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.7207''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.7205''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.7204''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on November 1, 2021, this is the first version of the launcher distributed to the Microsoft Store/Xbox app.

== Additions ==
* {{BE}} now in the Launcher.
* {{el|MCD}} from Microsoft Store now in the Launcher.
* Xbox Game Pass for PC subscribers who are on a Windows 10 or Windows 11 device and are using the new Launcher from the Microsoft Store/Xbox app can now play {{JE}}, {{BE}} and {{el|MCD}} under Game Pass.

== Changes ==
* Updated how accounts work in the Launcher.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bunch of UI bugs.</onlyinclude>
